name: Call of Duty FPS Tribute beta
name_original: Call of Duty FPS Tribute beta
description:
Developing a FPS Shooter Game based on CoD attemp like for now, the purpose of this project is  achieve an original product with original music, characters, weapons and physics.  

Now im developing the movements and system in general, the goal is start to design levels, characters, weapons and more. 

Having a lots of cool ideas, we are getting started. Thanks for supporting!

Final notes.

Fo now, Music and Models are not of my own, the were used only for learning purposes  Music and models belong to Activision, Raven Software, Treyarch, High Moon Studios, Beenox
